description:
This module provides a comprehensive coverage of
methods and tools for predictive data analytics.
Various techniques from data mining, statistics and
artificial intelligence will be discussed. The emphasis will
be on more recent developments in machine learning
methods such as neural networks and support vector
machines that have been shown to be very effective in
discovering reliable patterns from past data and making
accurate predictions of future outcomes. Applications of
predictive analytics in business will also be discussed.
title: Machine Learning for Predictive Data Analytics
